*****"ONLY FOR DESIGNER VERSION"*****: "The Avtomat Kalashnikova-47 was developed by the Soviets in the late 1940's. It was standard issue for Warsaw pact countries untill the AKM was developed in 1959. The AK-47 is the most widely used weapon in the world."

column3: the AKS-74U features a shorter barrel

*****"ONLY FOR DESIGNER VERSION"*****: "The United States M21 sniper rifle is a modified M14 National Match rifle

*****"ONLY FOR DESIGNER VERSION"*****: "The M60 Machine Gun has been the US Army's general-purpose machine gun since 1950. It fires the standard NATO 7.62mm round and is used as a general support crew-served weapon."

column7: Le lance-grenades M203 de 40 mm est ici fixÈ sur un fusil M16A2 de 5,56mm. Il s'agit d'un lance-grenades a pompe, lÈger, compact, a chargement par la culasse, qui tire un coup a la fois.

*****"ONLY FOR DESIGNER VERSION"*****: "The PK machine gun is the standard light machine gun of the former Soviet Union and many of its allies. The PK is a gas-operated
column4: belt-fed machine gun which fires from an open bolt. The weapon is fed from non-disintegrating metallic belts. These belts are comprised of 25-round sections that can be linked to any size necessary."

*****"ONLY FOR DESIGNER VERSION"*****: "The Reaktivniy Protivotankoviy Granatomet (Rocket-Propelled Grenade) entered into active service with the Soviet army in 1962. It was widely used by the North Vietnamese and Viet Cong during the Vietnam conflict."
column3: Le Reaktivniy Protivotankoviy Granatomet (grenade propulsÈe par une roquette) a fait son apparition en 1962 dans l'ArmÈe rouge. Il a ÈtÈ largement utilisÈ par les Nord-Vietnamiens et les Vietcongs lors de la guerre du Viet-nam.

*****"ONLY FOR DESIGNER VERSION"*****: "The Sa 58 Assault Rifle is a Czech weapon based on the popular Avtomat Kalashnikova AK-47 developed by the Soviets in the late 1940's. 93 countries across the globe have adopted this rifle design. The Sa 58 is designed for the destruction of lightly armored mobile enemy equipment and manpower. It is gas-operated and capable of firing in single shots or in bursts."
column3: Le fusil d'assaut Sa 58 est une arme tcheque inspirÈe du populaire AK-47 mis au point par les SoviÈtiques a la fin des annÈes 1940. Ce modele de fusil a ÈtÈ adoptÈ par 93 pays. *****"ONLY FOR DESIGNER VERSION"*****: "The 7.62mm Dragunov is a single-target sniper rifle designed to destroy open or screened
